item.title: 英国一家法院已下令推迟引渡朱利安-阿桑奇（Julian Assange），允许维基解密创始人继续上诉，反对将其移交美国接受指控。
item.description:
A court in the U.K. has ordered a delay in the possible extradition of Julian Assange, allowing the WikiLeaks founder to continue his appeal fighting a transfer to the U.S. to face charges. https://t.co/MB7aoErpM2 pic.twitter.com/MSEVC60U1Z

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：一份未分类的 CISA 报告称，集装箱船 "达利号 "在离港时 "失去推进力"，并警告马里兰州官员可能会发生碰撞。请关注巴尔的摩塌桥事故的最新现场报道：
item.description:
LATEST: The container ship Dali "lost propulsion" as it was leaving port and warned Maryland officials of a possible collision, an unclassified CISA report said.

Follow along for live updates from the Baltimore bridge collapse:https://t.co/jHtm617UkH

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：周二早些时候，一艘货轮撞击巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥，造成部分坍塌。该部门表示，潜水员正在搜寻至少七名落水者。
item.description:
LATEST: A cargo ship struck Baltimore's Francis Scott Key Bridge early Tuesday, causing a partial collapse. Divers were searching for at least seven people in the water, the department said. https://t.co/tpE8atstJQ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 新消息：英国一家法院已下令推迟引渡朱利安-阿桑奇（Julian Assange）的可能性，允许维基解密创始人继续上诉，反对将其移交美国接受指控。
item.description:
NEW: A court in the U.K. has ordered a delay in the possible extradition of Julian Assange, allowing the WikiLeaks founder to continue his appeal fighting a transfer to the U.S. to face charges.https://t.co/8PNUjOuUxm

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：白宫周二早些时候表示，白宫正在 "密切关注 "巴尔的摩的局势，一艘货轮撞上了一座主要桥梁。一位官员说，没有迹象表明 "有任何险恶用心"。
item.description:
JUST IN: The White House said early Tuesday that it was "closely monitoring" the situation in Baltimore, where a cargo ship struck a major bridge. There was no indication of "any nefarious intent," an official said. https://t.co/8ZPBXjShfh

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 纽约市官员表示，纽约市计划加强对地铁逃票者的打击力度，部署至少 800 名警察专门负责监控旋转栅门。
item.description:
NYC plans to intensify a crackdown on subway fare evaders by deploying at least 800 police officers specifically to monitor turnstiles, officials say.

It's the latest move to address concerns about crime and safety in the nation's busiest subway system. https://t.co/hsf7uiwGXO pic.twitter.com/nj4la0n6Dg

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息马里兰州州长韦斯-摩尔（Wes Moore）在巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥垮塌后宣布进入紧急状态。
item.description:
JUST IN: Maryland Gov. Wes Moore has declared a state of emergency following the collapse of the Francis Scott Key Bridge in Baltimore. https://t.co/OrWcdnr1TQ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 生日快乐：《大楼谋杀案》（Only Murders in the Building）主演马丁-肖特（Martin Short）今天 74 岁了。
item.description:
HAPPY BIRTHDAY: "Only Murders in the Building" star Martin Short is 74 today. https://t.co/Gk4bBpL1ft pic.twitter.com/kPrquulDRl

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: "警告的责任 "指引美国提前发出莫斯科袭击的警告。对手并不总是听话。
item.description:
"Duty to warn" guided U.S. advance warning of the Moscow attack. Adversaries don’t always listen. https://t.co/0iSUIujhSS

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 受害者称骗子自称是灵媒、女巫和爱尔兰女继承人，她将被引渡回英国。
item.description:
Scammer claimed to be a psychic, witch and Irish heiress, victims say as she faces extradition to U.K. https://t.co/3jRjshRcJT

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 在特朗普和拜登的激烈复选中，海莉的选民和捐赠者的明显分裂可能会损害特朗普的大选机会。
item.description:
In what's shaping up to be a tight rematch between Trump and Biden, the apparent splintering of Haley's voters and donors could hurt Trump's general election chances. https://t.co/ExpMoyrpW0

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 目击者拍摄的视频记录了巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥周二早些时候被一艘轮船撞击后部分坍塌的情况。
item.description:
Eyewitness video captures the aftermath of the partial collapse of Baltimore's Francis Scott Key Bridge, after it was struck by a ship early Tuesday. https://t.co/pTW4iwYImm pic.twitter.com/U6JJytk7yJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 周一，在强风的助燃下，墨西哥近一半受干旱影响的州都发生了森林火灾。据国家林业委员会报告，15 个州发生了 58 起火灾。
item.description:
Forest fires were burning in nearly half of Mexico’s drought-stricken states Monday fueled by strong winds.

The National Forestry Commission reported 58 active fires in 15 states.https://t.co/CFHgytlQbP

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 马里兰州官员说，一艘轮船周二早些时候撞击了巴尔的摩的弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥，造成部分坍塌。巴尔的摩市消防局说，坍塌时有多辆汽车从桥上坠落。
item.description:
A ship struck Baltimore's Francis Scott Key Bridge early Tuesday, causing a partial collapse, officials in Maryland said.

Multiple vehicles plunged from the bridge at the time of the collapse, the Baltimore City Fire Department said. https://t.co/73y5bZHPeW pic.twitter.com/MtlS5216kU

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥（Francis Scott Key Bridge）周二早些时候遭到一艘轮船撞击，造成部分坍塌，车辆和人员被卷入水中。
item.description:
BREAKING: A ship struck Baltimore's Francis Scott Key Bridge early Tuesday, causing a partial collapse and sending vehicles and people into the water, officials say. https://t.co/mCQSGhqvYB

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：马里兰州官员称，巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥在发生 "事故 "后部分坍塌。
item.description:
BREAKING: Baltimore's Francis Scott Key Bridge partially collapsed after an "incident," officials in Maryland say.

Police said there were "workers possibly in the water," after the collapse. https://t.co/kZvAY2y99z

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 事态发展：马里兰州交通管理局表示，巴尔的摩弗朗西斯-斯科特-基大桥在发生 "事故 "后已关闭交通。
item.description:
DEVELOPING: Baltimore's Francis Scott Key Bridge has been closed to traffic following an "incident," the Maryland Transportation Authority said. https://t.co/KrtYhH5Rq3

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 在威尔士王妃凯特周五公开自己的癌症诊断结果后，哈里王子和苏塞克斯公爵夫妇梅根表示支持凯特。
item.description:
Prince Harry and Meghan, the Duke and Duchess of Sussex, have offered their support for Kate, the Princess of Wales, after she opened up about her cancer diagnosis on Friday.https://t.co/vPUzKpDKAI

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 美国农业部周一表示，得克萨斯州和堪萨斯州奶牛的牛奶禽流感检测结果呈阳性。
item.description:
Milk from dairy cows in Texas and Kansas has tested positive for bird flu, U.S. officials said Monday.

Based on findings from Texas, officials think the cows got the virus from infected wild birds, the USDA said. https://t.co/UANH7uxadN

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 美国国税局（IRS）周一表示，美国约有 940,000 人可在 5 月 17 日之前提交报税表，申请 2020 税收年度无人认领的退税，全国范围内无人认领的退税总额超过 10 亿美元。
item.description:
The IRS said Monday that about 940,000 people in the U.S. have until May 17 to submit tax returns for unclaimed refunds for tax year 2020, which total more than $1 billion nationwide. https://t.co/rsWfXG0pEE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 据估计，本周三晚开奖的强力球彩票头奖奖金为 8.65 亿美元，是该彩票历史上第五大头奖。
item.description:
The Powerball jackpot is now estimated at $865 million for the next drawing on Wednesday night, making it the fifth-largest prize in the history of the game.https://t.co/pj2J7qAoPv pic.twitter.com/qHFt5CQOo9

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 田纳西州一家为约翰迪尔（John Deere）和雅马哈（Yamaha）等大公司生产零部件的制造商被勒令上缴 150 万美元的利润，因为劳工部发现该公司雇用儿童从事危险工作：
item.description:
A Tennessee parts manufacturer for major companies including John Deere and Yamaha has been ordered to turn over $1.5 million in profits after the Department of Labor found children employed in dangerous jobs.

Learn more: https://t.co/zOiBCZYYjW pic.twitter.com/5kYMsdY6jE

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 周一的大奖是强力球历史上第六大大奖。估计现金价值为 3.488 亿美元。
item.description:
No Powerball jackpot winners reported on Monday.

Monday's prize was the sixth-largest in Powerball history. The estimated cash value was $348.8 million.https://t.co/iizzGP1AHO

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 乔伊-格拉兹亚迪（Joey Graziadei）在 "单身汉 "节目中的寻爱之旅在周一晚戏剧性的大结局中画上了句号。
item.description:
Joey Graziadei's journey to find love on "The Bachelor" came to a close during Monday night's dramatic finale.https://t.co/qv9IdGnGI7

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 一名在妊娠 26 周时出生的 10 个月大的婴儿战胜了重重困难，从医院回到了家中。
item.description:
A 10-month-old who was born at 26 weeks gestation has beaten the odds to return home from the hospital. https://t.co/6VWU4sNoWJ

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 塔雷娅-约翰逊（Tareasa Johnson）在 TikTok 上发布的帖子引起了热议，这些帖子记录了她与一个男人结婚时的挣扎，她声称这个男人是个病态的骗子。
item.description:
Tareasa Johnson went viral over her TikTok posts chronicling her struggle of marrying a man who she claims turned out to be a pathological liar.

"Impact x @Nightline" takes a look at Johnson's story and the accounts of victims who said they were tricked. https://t.co/okheclVRF8

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 纽约市官员表示，纽约市计划加强对地铁逃票者的打击力度，部署至少 800 名警察专门负责监控旋转栅门。
item.description:
NYC plans to intensify a crackdown on subway fare evaders by deploying at least 800 police officers specifically to monitor turnstiles, officials say.

It's the latest move to address concerns about crime and safety in the nation's busiest subway system. https://t.co/sx9V8jOwWa pic.twitter.com/RzqF1jN7Ck

item.title: 这匹马清晨在佛罗里达州奥卡拉（Ocala）松脱并被警方追捕，警方安全地将它关进了笼子。
item.description:
Police safely corralled this horse after it got loose and led authorities on an early morning pursuit in Ocala, Florida.

The horse was reunited with its owner on the same day. pic.twitter.com/1ZI3r87WJb

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024

item.title: 在一段延时摄影视频中捕捉到两种最令人敬畏的国家现象：冰岛格林达维克镇附近的一座火山在北极光的映衬下喷发。
item.description:
Two of the most awe-inspiring national phenomena captured in one timelapse video: A volcano near the Icelandic town of Grindavik erupts against the backdrop of the Northern Lights. https://t.co/SQ6854DKS8 pic.twitter.com/bWZBER3b4w

— ABC News (@ABC) March 26, 2024
